snippet: A successful crowdfunding campaign has ended a plan by the San Diego Opera to close its doors.
abstract: San Diego Opera announces that it has raised $2.1 million through successful crowdfunding campaign that will allow it to stay open and live to see its 50th-anniversary season; board of directors previously voted to shut down after 49 years, citing dwindling ticket sales and philanthropic support.
lead_paragraph: A successful crowdfunding campaign has ended a plan by the San Diego Opera to close its doors.

headline.main: San Diego Opera Raises Money to Remain Open
headline.print_headline: San Diego Opera Raises Money to Remain Open
